game.name: Chernobots
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Chernobots is a retro 3D roguelite, allowing endless exploration of the dangerous and procedurally generated Chernobyl Exclusion Zone. Search for highly radioactive targets via remote controlled robots to get the job done or pay the price. Are you up for the gig?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Chernobots is a retro 3D roguelite, allowing endless exploration of the dangerous and procedurally generated Chernobyl Exclusion Zone. Search for highly radioactive targets via remote controlled robots to get the job done or pay the price. Are you up for the gig?
